files.description: Medgen Data Export & Backup Utility Guide v1.0 (July 2023, 79 pages). Documents the Medgen Backup Utility desktop application for exporting patient data as C-CDA XML files, patient document ZIPs, and supplementary CSV files (demographics, appointments, pharmacy, comments, and a 117-column billing transactions file). Includes installation instructions, configuration screenshots, C-CDA section-by-section documentation with template IDs, CSV column-level data dictionaries, and file naming conventions.
files.curl_command: curl -sL 'https://portal.medgenehr.com/Medgenweb/MedgenBackupUtility.pdf' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' -o MedgenBackupUtility.pdf
